definition[0]: to quickly put something into a liquid and take it out again, especially something you are eating
example[0]: Jill dunked her ginger biscuit in her tea.
example[1]: I dunked my head under the water and scrubbed at my hair.
definition[1]: to push someone under water for a short time as a joke
definition[2]: to jump up by the basket and throw the ball down into it in basketball
